name: Strongloop 3 Tier Deployment
description: Strongloop - An Easy starting point for full stack JavaScript web development.

metadata.longDescription: Deploys a Strongloop/Loopback framework with recommended software (Node.js, Angular.js, MongoDB) in VMware across a three tier virtual machine architecture. This deployment also deploys a simple sample application to validate the deployment is operational.

bullets.title: Topology
bullets.description:
VMware: 3 virtual machines:
  • - MongoDB,
  • - Strongloop/Node.js,
  • - Angular.js/Express.js/Node.js

bullets.title: Software deployed
bullets.description:
1. MongoDB:a NoSQL database
2. Strongloop:a complete solution that addresses all aspects of the API lifecycle, for both on-premises and cloud environments
3. Node.js:an execution environment for event-driven server-side and networking applications
4. Express.js:a web application framework that runs on Node.js
5. Angular.js:a JavaScript MVC framework that runs in browser JavaScript engines

bullets.title: Default virtual machine settings
bullets.description:
• VMware:
    • Flavor:
      • MongoDB:
        • Cores - 1
        • Memory - 1GB
        • Storage - Depends on Image
      • Strongloop:
        • Cores - 2
        • Memory - 4GB
        • Storage - Depends on Image
      • Angular.js:
        • Cores - 2
        • Memory - 4GB
        • Storage - Depends on Image
    • Network:
      • Private IP:
        • Availability - Customer Provided
        • Ingress - Via VPN
        • Egress - Allows HTTP to all destinations
      • Public IP:
        • Availability - None
    • Firewall:
      • MongoDB:
        • Ingress - Allows SSH, and TCP 27017 from all sources
        • Egress - All
      • Strongloop:
        • Ingress - Allows SSH, and TCP 3000 from all sources
        • Egress - All
      • Angular.js:
        • Ingress - Allows SSH, and TCP 8080 from all sources
        • Egress - All

bullets.title: Usage and special notes
bullets.description:
• 1. Downloads latest releases of software.
  • 2. To access the application and virtual machines, please see the instructions in the output log.
  • 3. The sample application in this deployment is partially from the open source project https://github.com/strongloop/loopback-example-angular and more details of software can be found in https://www.mongodb.com/, https://strongloop.com/, https://nodejs.org/en/, and https://angularjs.org/.
